properties.bal-decr-onlyif-wd-reclaim: after the donation phase, if the contract balance decreases then either a successful `withdraw` or `reclaim` have been performed.
properties.donate-not-revert: a transaction `donate` is not reverted if the donation phase has not ended.
properties.donate-not-revert-overflow: a transaction `donate` is not reverted if the donation phase has not ended and sum between the old and the current donation does not overflow.
properties.no-donate-after-deadline: calls to `donate` will revert if the donation phase has ended.
properties.no-receive-after-deadline: the contract balance does not increase after the end of the donation phase.
properties.no-wd-if-no-goal: calls to `withdraw` will revert if the contract balance is less than the `goal`.
properties.owner-only-recv: only the owner can receive ETH from the contract.
properties.reclaim-not-revert: a transaction `reclaim` is not reverted if the goal amount is not reached and the deposit phase has ended, and the sender has donated funds that they have not reclaimed yet.
properties.wd-not-revert: a transaction `withdraw` is not reverted if the contract balance is greater than or equal to the goal and the donation phase has ended.
properties.wd-not-revert-EOA: a transaction `withdraw` is not reverted if the contract balance is greater than or equal to the goal, the donation phase has ended, and the `receiver` is an EOA.
properties.donation-inc-onlyif-donate: if `donation[A]` is increased after a transaction (of the Crowdfund contract), then that transaction must be a `donate` where A is the sender.
properties.donate-bal-inc: a non-reverting call to `donate` does not decrease the balance of the contract.
properties.wd-full-balance: after a non-reverting `withdraw`, the whole balance of the contract is sent to `owner`.
properties.exists-unique-donation-change: after a non-reverting `donate` transaction to the Crowdfund contract, the donation of exactly one user has changed.
properties.donate-not-dec-donation: after a non-reverting `donate` transaction by user A, `donation[A]` is not decreased.
properties.donation-dec-onlyif-reclaim: if `donation[A]` decreases after a transaction (of the Crowdfund contract), then that transaction must be a `reclaim` where A is the sender.
properties.reclaim-own-funds: after a non-reverting `reclaim`, the balance of the `msg.sender` A is increased by `donation[A]`.
